scriptComments.develop: Runs local development build of the webapp, needs to be paired with a live server to serve it
scriptComments.build: Builds a js bundle that can be committed and pushed up to GH pages since this is a nonsensical monorepo
scriptComments.updateCardInfo:
Usage: npm run updateCardInfo -- <force update: true/false>     
updates the card info json and downloads associated card images, intended for use by GH Actions, and will use the provided token to commit said changes
scriptComments.generateDeckPage:
Usage: npm run generateDeckPage -- _decks/<deck list>.yml
